title: UAE's Alterra commits $1 billion to Brookfieldâ€™s climate fund
description: The $5-billion Catalytic Transition Fund (CTF) managed by Brookfield Asset Management receives a $1-billion commitment from UAE's Alterra Management Limited to invest in clean energy and transition assets in emerging economies.
